description: I installed and then tried to uninstall, no matter what it will not go away. I've uninstalled, tried turning it off with extension in the Gnome Tweak Tool. You cannot change the default picture folder and now every 30 minutes I get a blank wallpaper screen. Not good.

+ works as intended
+ can specify the timer for changes
+ works with all of my wallpapers in specific directory

- would be awesome if it kept track of wallpapers already used so it would cycle through all of my collection randomly (never show same wallpaper twice until all wallpapers have been shown)
nice little extension but i love wonderwall more
